hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Deku Stick#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Have you thought about going where the items are?^Just saying.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Map#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ Central Pillar Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nut Capacity#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #hearts#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nut Capacity#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Freestanding Key

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

ToT (Left).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #Ruto's Letter#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #the Minuet of Forest# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.
